metadata.query_body: When will my loan amount be credited to my account? Please update me on the disbursement status.

fields.subject: I am not received my disbursement
fields.email_body: When was my account credited in my accountÂ
fields.improcessing:
Dear User,

Thank you for contacting us again. We completely understand your concern about not yet receiving your loan amount, and we appreciate you staying patient with us.

We'd like to confirm that your loan application is currently listed and in the funding process. This means we are actively working on securing and preparing your funds for disbursement.

You can expect an update on your loan's progress very soon. Please also remember to check your registered email regularly, as we'll use it to notify you if any further documents are required from your end to complete this stage.

We're striving to get your funds to you as quickly as possible.

Should you have any other questions, please don't hesitate to ask.

Best Regards,
Team Instamoney
